83044.「あたし ノア。おじいちゃんと いっしょに\n この庭の お世話をしているよ！\:

, it was fun playing with you! Thank you for helping me make my doll.

83087.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「そこにおる 孫:
My granddaughter, Noor, over there seems to have woke up and found fun in sewing recently.
I gave her the sewing needle, thinking she'd use it casually, but... I never expected she'd keep herself busy with it for so long.
Good gracious, just think, had I known earlier that she'd take after me, having a talent for making and caring for things.
...Even in a made-up world, flowers grow. People's hearts are exactly the same. If there is light, they will grow.
From here on, I believe that Noor and I will continue to care for this garden.

65462.「馬ってヤツは 愛情を注げば 注ぐほど\n それに 応えてくれるんだ。\n<br:
The more love you give a horse, the more love they'll give to you. These guys aren't two-faced.
So the more faith you put into them, the more faith they'll put in you. Unlike people; save for the Hero Princess, that is.

65463.「海の向こうには 人間とは異なる\n 他種族の人たちが たくさん 住んでいるとか:
On the other side of the sea, I hear that there's lots of different tribes of people.
I'd love to take my wife there someday, but the Mystifying Mist keeps the boats from coming in to let us leave Lendersia...

65465.「グランゼドーラ城へ ようこそ！！\n この城には 王国を治める勇者姫\n 我ら:
Welcome to Gran Zedora Castle!! Within the castle is
the ruler of the kingdom & Hero Princess, our Lady
Anlucia!

65467.「グランゼドーラ城へ ようこそ！\n どうぞ ご自由に お通りください。:

65468.「わしゃ この城の庭師をやっとります。\n 小さな庭ですが アンルシア姫さまは\:

garden, but Princess Anlucia often goes out of her
way to visit us.

78268.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「もしかして 塔:

75441.人が通れそうな扉がある。\nしかし 中から カギがかけられているようだ。:

65469.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ああ……。今日:

I can feel this happiness thanks to the Hero Princess' keeping the peace for us all.

65470.「アンルシア姫さまが 真の勇者に\n 目覚める日が来たって 聞いたよ。\n<br:
I heard the day has come for Princess Anlucia to awaken as the True Hero.
The Princess is the only person I put my faith into outside these horses. I'll always believe in them.

70178.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「あれは なんの:

70182.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「グランゼドーラ:

70186.「我らが勇者姫は もういない。\n この城を守る価値も なくなった。\n<br>:
